channel.title: Homepage for Riley Shuping
channel.description: Recent content on Homepage for Riley Shuping

item.title: First
item.description:
This site is long overdue. It will ultimately be a collection of my various interests and plus a means to highlight some of the cool projects I’ve been able to work on.

In the meantime, some information about myself. My name is Riley and I’m based in Austin, TX. I did my undergrade degree in Chemical Engineering at the University of Texas at Austin, but have largely been on the process control / automation / software side of things since.

item.title: About Me
item.description:
Hi, Iâ€™m Riley Shuping.

I’m a Chemical Engineer that does automation / manufacturing software located in Austin, Texas. I enjoy a bit of photography, music, keeping up to date on the latest technology, and trying to keep a reasonable workout routine despite the current state of everything.

I’m extremely curious about the world and love to learn about how things work. My favorite author is Vaclav Smil simply because of his incredible blend of thoroughness and depth.
